name: Polysemous
description:
Polysemous is a 2D top-down survival horror game set in a 3D environment. You take control of Cecilia Akuji, a former thief turn medical officer on the HMCS Galatea a small research ship traversing the stars and researching various planets to expand the human race.After spending a year on a previously uncharted planet called Zora the crew finally heads home for the holidays. On their way back to Earth they come across a life pod. Shortly after hell breaks loose and Cecilia wakes up to hear the screams of her fellow crew members and the ship running on emergency power. Stuck in the depths of space. Cecilia must find any survivors while avoiding the monsters that are once her crew and to find a way off the ship she once called home.

Created by:

 Maja: Game Design, Sound Design, Narrative Design, 3D Models, Producer

Andrew: Programming, Implementation, Unity Development

Marc: Sprite Animations, Monster Design, Logo Design, Spritework

V: Character Design, Graphic Design, Illustrations, Talk Sprites, UI/UX
